subject: Re: duplication between test and productino code (was: Help,what's wrong with my TDD practice in my daily life?)
msgSnippet: ... if ... and ... It s make sence for me,But it s difficult to decide the right solution ,In many cases it s depends on one s experience.So the first things
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, Ilja Preuss <it@...> wrote:
>
> I think that duplication between test production code *is* a smell -
if
> perhaps not an as strong one. When I seen duplication such as in your
> example, I would still think a while about why it's there and how I
> could get rid of it - and most often that will lead to some insights
and
> an improved design, in my experience.
>
> Hope this helps,
>
> Ilja
>

It's make sence for me,But it's difficult to decide the right
solution ,In many cases it's depends on one's experience.So the first
things is to practice and practice.

Best Regards.

Yang Gu
